tool.name: IMAGINE-X image generator
tool.command:
mkdir data ; cp $input ./data/input.nxs.h5
## Run the docker container
#if $parameterTime.useTime == True #set $timeOption = "-#-time $parameterTime.time" #else #set $timeOption = "" #end if
bash -c 'docker run -#-rm -#-init -v \$(pwd)/data:/data imaginex-image-generator -#-input_file /data/input.nxs.h5 -#-output_dir /data/out $timeOption -#-wavelength_max $wavelengthMax -#-wavelength_min $wavelengthMin' ;

param.name: useTime
param.label: Use Time
param.help: Whether to use a time value.

tool.help: Iage generation for IMAGINE-X beamline data reduction.
